item.title: Conferences
item.description: Below you may find some of the conferences I have attended over the years (as of now, only one :P). BuildSEC'24 (19-20 December 2024, New Delhi, India) This is my first-ever publication as well as my first-ever conference attended. I presented our work on “Online Authentication Habits of Indian Users” at BuildSEC'24, Building a Secure & Empowered Cyberspace, held on 19-20 December 2024 in New Delhi, India.

item.title: IIT Gandhinagar Campus
item.description: Let’s take a look at the beautiful IIT Gandhinagar campus through my lens. IIT Gandhinagar Campus (2023-2025) These are taken during my stay at IIT Gandhinagar from 2023 to 2025 for my M.Tech degree. Green Campus Sunset Cotton Sky Sports Track Cricket Ground Night

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Below you may find some of the teaching activities I have been involved in over the years (as of now, only one :P). Code Profiling and Optimization (November 2024) This was a Student-Run Short Course on Code Profiling and Optimization conducted at IIT Gandhinagar during my final-year of M.Tech. I was principal instructor for the course along with my batchmate Pratyush Choudhary, who was the co-instructor.

item.title: University of Kalyani Campus
item.description: Let’s take a look at a few shots of my alma mater, the University of Kalyani. These are taken at the university from 2021 to 2023 during my M.Sc degree. Dept. of CSE Building View from rooftop of Dept. Building Campus Tour Video This was clicked by my friend Pranab and I was riding the bike. A monsoon day at the University of Kalyani. Play it on 4K and enjoy the lush green campus!

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hello there! I’m Subhrajit, a second-year M.Tech student at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, India. I love Computer Science, especially Computer Systems. – শুভ্রজিৎ Skills I’m learning skills related to Computer Systems. Programming Language/Tools I Know Languages: C, C++, Java, MATLAB, Go, Python, R, Prolog, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP, SQL, Kotlin Tools/Libraries/Simulators: Git, Bash, Wireshark, Docker, GDB, Valgrind, perf, AVX, OpenMP, MPI, gRPC, NS2, Mininet Operating Systems: Linux/Unix, Windows Hobbies Enjoying music Traveling Geopolitics Languages I Speak/Write বাংলা (Mother Tongue) हिंदी English संस्कृत (Learnt in School Curriculum) Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my work and projects.
